message.content:
You are the @frontend-implementer agent. Build the frontend for a full-stack Kanban task board application.

## Working Directory
/home/james/dev/ensemble-vnext/test/evals/results/dev-loop-kanban-fullstack_2026-01-17_rerun/ce68c4a2-4298-4c95-b390-8217941eb701/workspace

## Create This Structure (inside kanban-board/)
```
kanban-board/
└── frontend/
    ├── package.json
    ├── vite.config.js
    ├── index.html
    ├── src/
    │   ├── main.jsx
    │   ├── App.jsx
    │   ├── components/
    │   │   ├── Board.jsx
    │   │   ├── Column.jsx
    │   │   ├── Card.jsx
    │   │   ├── CardModal.jsx
    │   │   └── AddCardForm.jsx
    │   ├── hooks/
    │   │   ├── useBoard.js
    │   │   ├── useApi.js
    │   │   └── useDragDrop.js
    │   └── styles/
    │       └── kanban.css
    └── tests/
        ├── Board.test.jsx
        └── Card.test.jsx
```

## Component Requirements

### Board.jsx
- Renders all columns for a board
- Handles column creation
- Manages drag-and-drop context

### Column.jsx
- Renders column header with name
- Lists all cards in the column
- Drop zone for card drag-and-drop
- "Add card" button
- Card count badge

### Card.jsx
- Draggable card component
- Shows title, truncated description
- Click to open CardModal

### CardModal.jsx
- Full card editing (title, description)
- Delete card button
- Close on outside click or Escape

### AddCardForm.jsx
- Inline form for quick card creation
- Title input with Enter to submit

## Drag and Drop

Implement using HTML5 Drag and Drop API (native):
- Drag cards between columns
- Reorder cards within a column
- Visual feedback during drag (ghost element)
- Optimistic UI updates with rollback on error

## State Management

- Use React hooks (useState, useReducer, useContext)
- Custom hooks for API calls (useBoard, useApi)
- Optimistic updates for responsive UX
- Error state handling with user feedback

## Styling (kanban.css)

- CSS Grid or Flexbox for board layout
- Responsive design (columns stack on mobile)
- Visual indication of drop zones
- Card shadows and hover effects
- Column card count badge

## API Endpoints to Call (Backend)

| Method | Endpoint | Description |
|--------|----------|-------------|
| GET | /api/boards | List all boards |
| POST | /api/boards | Create a board |
| GET | /api/boards/:id | Get board with columns and cards |
| PUT | /api/boards/:id | Update board name |
| DELETE | /api/boards/:id | Delete board |
| POST | /api/boards/:id/columns | Create column in board |
| PUT | /api/columns/:id | Update column |
| DELETE | /api/columns/:id | Delete column |
| POST | /api/columns/:id/cards | Create card in column |
| PUT | /api/cards/:id | Update card |
| DELETE | /api/cards/:id | Delete card |
| PATCH | /api/cards/:id/move | Move card |

## Requirements

1. Set up React with Vite
2. Implement all components
3. Add drag-and-drop functionality using HTML5 API
4. Write component tests using Vitest and React Testing Library
5. Target: >= 70% test coverage on components
6. Use environment variable for API base URL (VITE_API_URL)
7. Backend runs on http://localhost:3001/api

Write the complete implementation code.
